CWITools Documentation¶

cwitools.parameters

Tools for using CWITools parameter files.

cwitools.coordinates

Tools for working with headers and world coordinate systems.

cwitools.reduction

Tools for extended data reduction.

cwitools.imaging

Tools for masking, smoothing, and extracting regions.

cwitools.subtraction

Tools for subtracting sources and background.

cwitools.variance

Tools for variance estimation and scaling.

cwitools.kinematics

Tools for kinematic calculations.

cwitools.modeling

Tools for modeling, fitting, and model comparison
